name: HackerBuzz
0:
”Alexa, open hacker buzz”
”Alexa, ask hacker buzz to read news”
”Alexa, ask hacker buzz to read me netsec”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hacker buzz
des: Read you 5 "top stories" from Hacker News, or 5 posts from the "hot" board of /r/netsec on reddit. Posts must meet certain reputation criteria (scores, upvotes etc).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
